name: Barbell Back Squat
description: Compound lower body movement targeting quads and glutes
instructions: 1. Set bar on upper traps. 2. Unrack and step back. 3. Brace core, squat to parallel. 4. Drive through heels to stand.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: 1. Hold barbell at hip height. 2. Push hips back, lowering bar along shins. 3. Feel stretch in hamstrings. 4. Drive hips forward to stand.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Horizontal pressing movement for chest development
instructions: 1. Lie on bench holding dumbbells above chest. 2. Lower to chest level. 3. Press up to full extension.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: 1. Hang from bar with overhand grip. 2. Pull chin above bar. 3. Lower with control.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Single-leg squat variation for unilateral strength
instructions: 1. Rear foot elevated on bench. 2. Lower until front thigh is parallel. 3. Drive through front heel to stand.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Loaded carry for grip and core stability
instructions: 1. Pick up heavy weights in each hand. 2. Stand tall, shoulders back. 3. Walk with controlled steps for prescribed distance.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: 1. Stand sideways to cable at chest height. 2. Hold handle at chest. 3. Press arms straight out, resisting rotation. 4. Return to chest.

name: Plank
instructions: 1. Forearms on floor, body in straight line. 2. Brace core, squeeze glutes. 3. Hold for prescribed duration.

name: Treadmill Run
instructions: 1. Set desired speed and incline. 2. Maintain upright posture. 3. Swing arms naturally.

name: Lateral Band Walk
description: Activation exercise for hip abductors and glute medius
instructions: 1. Place band above knees. 2. Slight squat position. 3. Step laterally with control. 4. Maintain tension throughout.
